slider.name: EnvTimeSlider
slider.tool_tip: Use this slider to change the day's phase locally on the viewer.

check_box.name: EnvUseEstateTimeCheck
check_box.label: Estate time in use
check_box.tool_tip: When checked, indicates that the time of day is the estate's Windlight time.

button.name: preview_btn
button.label: Preview frame
button.tool_tip: Adopt the Windlight sky and water settings for the current frame as Extended Environment local settings for preview.

slider.name: EnvCloudSlider
slider.label: Cloud cover
slider.tool_tip: Use this slider to control how much the clouds cover the sky.

color_swatch.name: EnvWaterColor
color_swatch.tool_tip: Click to open the color picker and change the color of the water.

slider.name: EnvWaterFogSlider
slider.label: Water fog
slider.tool_tip: Controls how dense the fog is underwater.

panel.name: day_cycle
panel.label: Day cycle
panel.text: Live preview is not available in Extended Environment rendering mode: use the 'Preview frame' button.

panel.name: sky
panel.label: Sky

text.name: BHText
text.tool_tip: Use the Red/Green/Blue (RGB) sliders to adjust the color of the sky. You can use the Intensity (I) slider to move all three RGB sliders in unison.

slider.name: WLBlueHorizonR
slider.label: R
slider.tool_tip: Adjusts the red channel for the color of the sky.

slider.name: WLBlueHorizonG
slider.label: G
slider.tool_tip: Adjusts the green channel for the color of the sky.

slider.name: WLBlueHorizonB
slider.label: B
slider.tool_tip: Adjusts the blue channel for the color of the sky.

slider.name: WLBlueHorizonI
slider.label: I
slider.tool_tip: Adjusts the all three color channels for the color of the sky, varying the intensity.

text.name: HHText
text.tool_tip: Haze horizon is one of the most useful parameters for adjusting overall light exposure in the scene. It is effective for simulating many exposure settings, such as white-outs from the sun and darker, closed-iris settings.

slider.name: WLHazeHorizon
slider.tool_tip: Haze horizon is one of the most useful parameters for adjusting overall light exposure in the scene. It is effective for simulating many exposure settings, such as white-outs from the sun and darker, closed-iris settings.

text.name: BDensText2
text.tool_tip: Blue density affects the overall color saturation of the sky and fog. If you move the Intensity (I) slider to the right, colors will become brighter and more vibrant. If you move it all the way to the left, the colors will become duller, eventually fading to black and white. If you want to fine-tune the sky's color balance, you can control individual elements of saturation by using the Red/Green/Blue (RGB) sliders.

slider.name: WLBlueDensityR
slider.label: R
slider.tool_tip: Blue density affects the overall color saturation of the sky and fog. If you want to fine-tune the sky's color balance, you can control the red channel of the saturation by using this slider.

slider.name: WLBlueDensityG
slider.label: G
slider.tool_tip: Blue density affects the overall color saturation of the sky and fog. If you want to fine-tune the sky's color balance, you can control the green channel of the saturation by using this slider.

slider.name: WLBlueDensityB
slider.label: B
slider.tool_tip: Blue density affects the overall color saturation of the sky and fog. If you want to fine-tune the sky's color balance, you can control the blue channel of the saturation by using this slider.

slider.name: WLBlueDensityI
slider.label: I
slider.tool_tip: Blue density affects the overall color saturation of the sky and fog. If you move the this slider to the right, colors will become brighter and more vibrant. If you move it all the way to the left, the colors will become duller, eventually fading to black and white..

text.name: HDText
text.tool_tip: Haze density controls the level of dull, gray haze in the atmosphere. It is effective for simulating scenes with high levels of smoke and man-made pollutants. It is also effective for simulating fog and mist.

slider.name: WLHazeDensity
slider.tool_tip: Haze density controls the level of dull, gray haze in the atmosphere. It is effective for simulating scenes with high levels of smoke and man-made pollutants. It is also effective for simulating fog and mist.

text.name: DensMultText
text.tool_tip: The Density multiplier can be used to affect the overall atmospheric density. At lower settings, it creates a feeling of "thin air", and at higher settings, it creates a very heavy, smoggy effect.

slider.name: WLDensityMult
slider.tool_tip: The Density multiplier can be used to affect the overall atmospheric density. At lower settings, it creates a feeling of "thin air", and at higher settings, it creates a very heavy, smoggy effect.

text.name: WLDistanceMultText
text.tool_tip: Adjusts WindLight's perceived distance. A value of zero effectively turns off WindLight's influence on terrain and objects. Values greater than 1 simulate greater distances for thicker atmospheric effects.

slider.name: WLDistanceMult
slider.tool_tip: Adjusts WindLight's perceived distance. A value of zero effectively turns off WindLight's influence on terrain and objects. Values greater than 1 simulate greater distances for thicker atmospheric effects.

text.name: MaxAltText
text.tool_tip: Max altitude adjusts the altitude calculations WindLight performs when computing its atmospheric lighting. At later times of day, it is useful for adjusting how "deep" the sunset appears.

slider.name: WLMaxAltitude
slider.tool_tip: Max altitude adjusts the altitude calculations WindLight performs when computing its atmospheric lighting. At later times of day, it is useful for adjusting how "deep" the sunset appears.

text.name: SLCText
text.tool_tip: Adjusts the color and intensity of the direct light in the scene.

slider.name: WLSunlightR
slider.label: R
slider.tool_tip: Adjusts the red channel for the direct light in the scene.

slider.name: WLSunlightG
slider.label: G
slider.tool_tip: Adjusts the green channel for the direct light in the scene.

slider.name: WLSunlightB
slider.label: B
slider.tool_tip: Adjusts the blue channel for the direct light in the scene.

slider.name: WLSunlightI
slider.label: I
slider.tool_tip: Adjusts the intensity for the direct light in the scene.

text.name: TODText
text.tool_tip: Controls the location of the Sun in the sky. Similar to elevation.

slider.name: WLSunAngle
slider.tool_tip: Controls the location of the Sun in the sky. Similar to elevation.

text.name: WLAmbientText
text.tool_tip: Adjusts the color and intensity of ambient atmospheric light in the scene.

slider.name: WLAmbientR
slider.label: R
slider.tool_tip: Adjusts the red channel for the of the ambient atmospheric light in the scene.

slider.name: WLAmbientG
slider.label: G
slider.tool_tip: Adjusts the green channel for the of the ambient atmospheric light in the scene.

slider.name: WLAmbientB
slider.label: B
slider.tool_tip: Adjusts the blue channel for the of the ambient atmospheric light in the scene.

slider.name: WLAmbientI
slider.label: I
slider.tool_tip: Adjusts the intensity of the ambient atmospheric light in the scene.

text.name: WLEastAngleText
text.tool_tip: Controls the location of the sun in the sky. Similar to azimuth.

slider.name: WLEastAngle
slider.tool_tip: Controls the location of the sun in the sky. Similar to azimuth.

text.name: SunGlowText
text.tool_tip: The Size slider controls the size of the Sun. The Focus slider controls how blurred the Sun is over the sky.

slider.name: WLGlowR
slider.label: Size
slider.tool_tip: This slider controls the size of the Sun.

slider.name: WLGlowB
slider.label: Focus
slider.tool_tip: This slider controls how blurred the Sun is over the sky.

text.name: SceneGammaText
text.tool_tip: Adjust the screen's distribution of light and dark.

slider.name: WLGamma
slider.tool_tip: Adjust the screen's distribution of light and dark.

text.name: WLStarText
text.tool_tip: Adjusts the brightness of the stars in the sky.

slider.name: WLStarAlpha
slider.tool_tip: Adjusts the brightness of the stars in the sky.

text.name: WLCloudColorText
text.tool_tip: Edits the color of the clouds. It is generally recommended to keep it whitish, but hey, have fun if you want.

slider.name: WLCloudColorR
slider.label: R
slider.tool_tip: Adjusts the red channel for the color of the clouds.

slider.name: WLCloudColorG
slider.label: G
slider.tool_tip: Adjusts the green channel for the color of the clouds.

slider.name: WLCloudColorB
slider.label: B
slider.tool_tip: Adjusts the blue channel for the color of the clouds.

slider.name: WLCloudColorI
slider.label: I
slider.tool_tip: Adjusts the intensity for the color of the clouds.

text.name: WLCloudColorText2
text.tool_tip: Allows you to control the position of the clouds with the X and Y sliders and how dense they are with the the D slider.

slider.name: WLCloudX
slider.label: X
slider.tool_tip: Changes the X position of the clouds.

slider.name: WLCloudY
slider.label: Y
slider.tool_tip: Changes the Y position of the clouds.

slider.name: WLCloudDensity
slider.label: D
slider.tool_tip: Changes the density of the clouds.

text.name: WLCloudCoverageText
text.tool_tip: Controls how much the clouds cover the sky.

slider.name: WLCloudCoverage
slider.tool_tip: Controls how much the clouds cover the sky.

text.name: WLCloudCoverageText
text.tool_tip: Controls the scaling of the cloud image on the sky dome.

slider.name: WLCloudScale
slider.tool_tip: Controls the scaling of the cloud image on the sky dome.

text.name: WLCloudDetailText
text.tool_tip: Controls the detail image layered on top of the main cloud image. X and Y control its position. D (Density) controls how puffy or fractured the clouds appear.

slider.name: WLCloudDetailX
slider.label: X
slider.tool_tip: Controls the X position of the detail image layered on top of the main cloud image.

slider.name: WLCloudDetailY
slider.label: Y
slider.tool_tip: Controls the Y position of the detail image layered on top of the main cloud image.

slider.name: WLCloudDetailDensity
slider.label: D
slider.tool_tip: Controls how puffy or fractured the clouds appear.

text.name: WLCloudScrollXText
text.tool_tip: Controls the speed of the clouds as they move in the X direction.

slider.name: WLCloudScrollX
slider.tool_tip: Controls the speed of the clouds as they move in the X direction.

text.name: WLCloudScrollYText
text.tool_tip: Controls the speed of the clouds as they move in the Y direction.

slider.name: WLCloudScrollY
slider.tool_tip: Controls the speed of the clouds as they move in the Y direction.

check_box.name: DrawClassicClouds
check_box.label: Draw classic clouds
check_box.tool_tip: Check this box to enable the rendering of the particles-like (legacy), low altitude clouds in addition to WindLight's high altitude clouds.

panel.string: A-12AM:A-12PM:A-3AM:A-3PM:A-4.30PM:A-6AM:A-6PM:A-9AM:A-9PM:Barcelona:Blizzard:Blue Midday:Coastal Afternoon:Coastal Sunset:Default:Desert Sunset:Fine Day:Fluffy Big Clouds:Foggy:Funky Funky:Funky Funky Funky:Gelatto:Ghost:Incongruent Truths:Midday 1:Midday 2:Midday 3:Midday 4:Night:Pirate:Purple:Sailor's Delight:Sheer Sensuality

text.name: WaterFogColorText
text.tool_tip: Allows to change the color of the water fog.

color_swatch.name: WaterFogColor
color_swatch.tool_tip: Click to open the color picker and change the color of the water fog.

text.name: WaterFogDensText
text.tool_tip: Controls how dense the water fog is and how far you can see underwater.

slider.name: WaterFogDensity
slider.tool_tip: Controls how dense the water fog is and how far you can see underwater.

text.name: WaterUnderWaterFogModText
text.tool_tip: Modifies the effect of the 'Fog density exponent' to control how far you can see when your avatar is underwater.

slider.name: WaterUnderWaterFogMod
slider.tool_tip: Modifies the effect of the 'Fog density exponent' to control how far you can see when your avatar is underwater.

text.name: ReflectionText
text.tool_tip: Controls the scaling of the three wavelets that make up the water.

slider.name: WaterNormalScaleX
slider.tool_tip: Controls the scaling of the first of the three wavelet that make up the water.

slider.name: WaterNormalScaleY
slider.tool_tip: Controls the scaling of the second of the three wavelet that make up the water.

slider.name: WaterNormalScaleZ
slider.tool_tip: Controls the scaling of the third of the three wavelet that make up the water.

text.name: FresnelScaleText
text.tool_tip: Controls how much light is reflected at different angles.

slider.name: WaterFresnelScale
slider.tool_tip: Controls how much light is reflected at different angles.

text.name: FresnelOffsetText
text.tool_tip: Controls how much light intensity is reflected.

slider.name: WaterFresnelOffset
slider.tool_tip: Controls how much light intensity is reflected.

text.name: RefractionAboveText
text.tool_tip: Controls how much light is refracted from looking above the water surface.

slider.name: WaterScaleAbove
slider.tool_tip: Controls how much light is refracted from looking above the water surface.

text.name: RefractionBelowText
text.tool_tip: Controls how much light is refracted from looking below the water surface.

slider.name: WaterScaleBelow
slider.tool_tip: Controls how much light is refracted from looking below the water surface.

text.name: BlurMultiplierText
text.tool_tip: Controls how waves and reflections are mixed.

slider.name: WaterBlurMult
slider.tool_tip: Controls how waves and reflections are mixed.

text.name: BigWavesDirText
text.tool_tip: Controls where and how fast the large scaled version of the normal map moves in the X and Y directions.

slider.name: WaterWave1DirX
slider.label: X
slider.tool_tip: Controls where and how fast the large scaled version of the normal map moves in the X direction.

slider.name: WaterWave1DirY
slider.label: Y
slider.tool_tip: Controls where and how fast the large scaled version of the normal map moves in the Y direction.

text.name: LittleWavesDirText
text.tool_tip: Controls where and how fast the small scaled version of the normal map moves in the X and Y directions.

slider.name: WaterWave2DirX
slider.label: X
slider.tool_tip: Controls where and how fast the small scaled version of the normal map moves in the X direction.

slider.name: WaterWave2DirY
slider.label: Y
slider.tool_tip: Controls where and how fast the small scaled version of the normal map moves in the Y direction.

text.name: NormalMapText
text.tool_tip: Controls what normal map is layered across the water to determine reflections/refractions.

texture_picker.name: WaterNormalMap
texture_picker.tool_tip: Click to change the normal map texture that is layered across the water to determine reflections/refractions.
